seo_content:
Exclusive Maven Trading Offer

Maven, based in Saint Lucia and established in November 2022, is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant programs. Account sizes range from $2,000 to $200,000. Supported platforms are MT5 and Match market participant. Tradable instruments include major forex pairs such as EURUSD and GBPUSD, XAUUSD (gold), and indices including US30 and UK100; leverage is 30:1. The firm has a review score of 4.3/5 from 637 reviews. confirmed by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Maven Promo Code: Check website Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Maven using our exclusive discount code. validated for the current trading season.
